verses.name: Zechariah 6:1
verses.text: And I turned, and lifted up mine eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came four chariots out from between two mountains; and the mountains were mountains of brass.

verses.name: Zechariah 6:2
verses.text: In the first chariot were red horses; and in the second chariot black horses;

verses.name: Zechariah 6:3
verses.text: And in the third chariot white horses; and in the fourth chariot grisled and bay horses.

verses.name: Zechariah 6:4
verses.text: Then I answered and said unto the angel that talked with me, What are these, my lord?
